title: An ECG-Based Model for Left Ventricular Hypertrophy Detection: A Machine Learning Approach

abstract: Goal: Despite the high incidence of left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH), clinical LVH- electrocardiography (ECG) criteria remain unsatisfactory due to low sensitivity. We propose an automatic LVH detection method based on ECG-extracted features and …

title: Zheng-Kai Xue, Kang-Yin Chen, Xin-Mu Li, Tong Liu, Jia-Wei Xie, Shao-Hua Guo, Wen-Hua Song, Hui-Min Chu, Guo-Hua Fu, Ni-Xiao Zhang, Bin Zhou, Min Tang
